content: 🎵 Attending CHI 2025! Presenting a paper (on by b-day 🥳), co-organizing a workshop.
✈️ Honored to have received PhD offers from Princeton, U of Washington, U of Michigan, and Georgia Tech. Excited to attend the in-person visit days and decide which path fits best!
📄 My first-authored NAVER internship paper (ExploreSelf) is accepted to CHI 2025. See you in Yokohama, Japan!
🎵 Excited to start my research internship @NAVER AI Lab!
✈️ Attending NeurIPS 2023 in person! 📍 New Orleans
✈️ Attending UIST 2023 in person! 📍 San Fransisco
👩🏻‍💻 Serving as Student Volunteer for CSCW'23! 📍 Minneapolis
🐝 Starting my exchange semester at Georgia Tech. Go Jackets!
